tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: she is a great doctor always pleasant and smiling. **** ************** *** ********* *** ********* ****** ***** ***** she has been treating my boys since they are 6 months old the  older one is 5 now and the younger one 2 years old. the doctor always calmed us with proper explanation of the fever, time it would take to subside and medication clearly and never suggested admission when not required. Though we spend lot less than 5 minutes in consultation most of the time we went back satisfied. My kids also like her . would highly recommend her to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Pallavi Maddukuri has given ********* treatment for our daughter, who was infected by viral fever and was in emergency ward with very high fever. Doctor is very good at analysing the disease *** ****** **** ********** I would recommend to visit rainbow hospital for any paediatric problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** **** ***** *** * **** ******* *v visited for a hand feet  treatment for my 4 yr old kid ,she ******* *** ******spoke soo rudely not at all patient in listening,was sooo rude,she sent ys bck within an 1min,my dad was explainsing something and she was talking and scolding **** ******** *** ********* ** *** **** * ****** * never ever I recommend her ,don't go to her, no patience *** ****  ********* **** *** ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My kid was throwing up and we went to visit her. I told her we see lot of mucus when he vomits. She told his lungs are clear and his throat is clear and has asked us to give less food as it summer. My kid was throwing up whole night. Visited another doctor from same hospital whom we normally visit and came to know his lungs were not clear and that is reason for his vomiting

She does not even listen when we talk .Talking in English does not mean you have to be rude. Pls have some patience as we might be first time parents and does not know how to handle kid properly. * *** *** **** *** ******* **** * *** ***** ** **** ** **** **** ** **** ** **** ******** **** ******* **** ** *** ******* ***** *** ***

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The doctor is very busy due to overloaded patients and doesn't talk for more than 1 minute  due to this rush. Doesn't have patience to talk to the patients.  Can be more polite. Asks to make frequent visits but every visit of ours looks like a vain hoping for improvement. 
We heard very good review of treatment, but if the behavior improves then it will be more satisfactory and promising for future visits.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She was there for me at all the times right from my childhood. She does interacted with us very well. Upto me she is my next goddess after my mom. She worked on me as if she was doing as research. She doesn't give up at any cost. I couldn't feel any pain in her treatment. She psychological motivates people to overcome.  It's 9 years ago she treated me but yet still I thank god first and her the post daily for giving me a rebirth. Trust me and believe me. She will do her best for us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dont go to her.We been there as my child as vomtings since two days as it is walking we were waiting for 1.5 hours, finally when our name was called she didn't even check my daughter for one min( in vomtings atleast they will check for tongue, stomach and eyes, she Didn't even touched my child) just wrote some antibiotics. She seems to b busy and asking nurse to stop the patients coming . This doctors should atleast understand we come all over to rainbow leaving behind 10 hospitals near house because of itz brand value* **** *** *** ** ** ******* ****** **** ****** ******* **** **** *** ** ** ********* ***  ***** ***** *** ***** ** ***** **** ****** ******* **** ******** ****** **** **** **** ******* ** *** **** **** ******** *** ***** ****** **** ***** After paying huge consultation and cab charges still we don't get enough treatment for you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ******* ********** ** **** *********  ****** ** ******* ******** ********* Today I visited hospital with my daughter for reports verification. We waited around 1hour and she said we need wait for till the complete OPD is finish. Though we are regular patients she didn’t show interest in seeing the reports becoz we didn’t pay consultation for the showing the reports.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
She saved my child’s life. My child was having continuous fever and every doctor just prescribed usual medication and sent us home. She was the one who said something different ... she looked at my child’s tummy and felt something wrong. Indeed it was first stage of cancer.  This early detection saved my child !!

God bless her with all the success and knowledge
